content:
That's a great idea! By following the Modern Art Museum's website and social media, you'll be able to stay up-to-date on their latest events, exhibitions, and programs. You might even get exclusive behind-the-scenes peeks, artist interviews, or sneak previews of upcoming shows.

Remember to also explore the online resources I mentioned earlier to discover more about Rachel Lee's work and other local artists. You might stumble upon new artists, exhibitions, or events that resonate with you.

If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask. Otherwise, happy art exploring, and I hope you enjoy the next event or exhibition you attend!
